objects.name: Quarry
objects.description: One of the most popular indoor climbing venues in Utah Valley

objects.name: Virtual Experience
objects.description: Virtual Reality arcade on Center Street

objects.name: Get Out Games
objects.description: Popular escape room venue with one room involving a zombie on a chain

objects.name: Provo Rec Center
objects.description: State-of-the-art recreation center with indoor track, pool, gym, and multiple basketball/raquetball courts

objects.name: Sundance
objects.description: Ski resort, mountain biking, and expensive hotel

objects.name: Bridal Veil Falls
objects.description: Short, easy hike to a picturesque waterfall

objects.name: Rock Canyon Climbing
objects.description: Wide variety of rock climbing routes all throughout the canyon

objects.name: High Country Adventure
objects.description: River rafting, horseback riding, tubing, ziplines, and overall awesome

objects.name: Art After Dark
objects.description: Free art show event at the BYU MOA with music and refreshments

objects.name: Covey Center for the Arts
objects.description: Live performanes, dance classes, and art galleries

objects.name: Utah Valley Symphony
objects.description: Nonprofit orchestra performing regularly at the Covey Center

objects.name: BYU Museum of Peoples & Cultures
objects.description: Museum featuring artifacts from across the world

objects.name: Good Move Cafe
objects.description: Great food and a massive selection of board games to play while you eat

objects.name: Rockwell Ice Cream
objects.description: Old-fashioned creamery good enough to rival the BYU Creamery

objects.name: Sodalicious
objects.description: Soda shop with dozens of customizable flavors and mixes, and life-changing cookies

objects.name: Don Joaquin
objects.description: Amazing, authentic street tacos, open late
